author: MIKE STOBBE AP Medical Writer
title: Some doctors moving away from ventilators for virus patients
description: Health officials around the world are pushing to get more ventilators to treat coronavirus patients, but some doctors actually are moving away from using the machines
content:
NEW YORK -- 
As health officials around the world push to get more ventilators to treat coronavirus patients, some doctors are moving away from using the breathing machines when they can.
The reason: Some hospitals have reported unusually high death rates f… [+6306 chars]
